description:
With the aim of becoming a professional tennis player, Eiichiro trains abroad at the Florida Tennis Academy for a short while.  Being within an environment solely dedicated to tennis excites Eiichiro.  When all of the sudden, he meets Marcia, a girl with a beautiful smile.  The two have a match with each other as told by the coach.  Marcia’s hits were stronger than expected, but she increasingly became irritated…
Source: crunchyroll
